div.p: Dillingham, Alaska from Emily Hendricks on Vimeo.
Dillingham School District - Alaska from Emily Hendricks on Vimeo.

div.br:
​
Inspire students to be culturally connected, active community members and motivated to fulfill their goals and dreams.
Mission:
As part of the community, the Dillingham City School District will promote and lead a safe, supportive and equitable learning environment.
